News.SubTitle: Initial Release!
News.Title: Town of Sushi v1.0.0
Text: - Special thanks to @Windyways for the help!
-First release, but here's the changes i've done so far from TOU-M:
-Investigator's ability to see footsteps is now a separate modifier. This change also renames current Investigator to Inspector.
-Eclipsal is a Neutral Killer rather than Impostor now because it's too similar to Grenadier.
-Sheriff & Vigilante are the same role now
-Legacy Arsonist (new Arsonist is new called Pyromaniac)
-Extended the Mystic Arrow Duration time to a maximum of 3 seconds instead of 1.
-Amnesiac now is able to Vest like the Survivor used to.
-New Options for Guardian Angel, Executioner & Romantic to become Thief on target's death.
-New option to hide vent animations out of vision.
-Option for Jester to move thru vents.
-Mystic has an ability to examine players, they get a list of possible roles their target can be (similar to Doomsayer's observe)
-New option for thief to become Assassin if killing an impostor/neutral killer.
-Adds a hidden in game tool for testing locally (MCI)
-Note: Ignore the files and game saying its version 3.0.0, its 1.0, trust.
- Note note: i didnt include all changes bc uh i forgot them.

News.SubTitle: Bug Fix Update!
News.Title: Town of Sushi v1.0.1
Text: - Changed the mod's versioning to start from 1.0 again since I'm basically starting off again with the previous versions!
- Fixed some hats being out of the character position.
- Fixed Operative being able to use their abilities in meetings and during the ejection scene.
- Fixed Operative's button having the same Keybind.
- Fixed Crusader's kill checks making the game create multiple kill scenes.
- Fixed role/modifier alignment strings (e.g., 'CrewmateSupport' now shows as 'Crewmate Support').
- The text in the task list (Tasks: 0/x) is no longer visible for non-crewmates.
- Added a brand-new Mod Updater to update the mod easily (Each release will specify if you can use it or not, as sometimes AU updates tend to break mods).
- New Option: Consigliere Teammates Can See Role on Reveal.
- New option to make Airship doors act like Polus doors.
- New option that blocks dead impostors from sabotaging.
- New option for Seer to know what the 2 factions are when checking targets.
- New Thief option: Can guess to steal role.
- New Thief option: Can Kill Sheriff.
- Added a new option for Transporter to self-transport.
- The map of each player now shows their role color.
- Vampire color is now back to its original TOU-R color.
- Removed 'See Tasks During Round' option, as the tasks are already shown in the banner.
